header.title: SafetyHelp
header.tagline: Polokeho e ikhethileng, ho nolofatsa ho latela‚Äîneng kapa neng, kae kapa kae

step_0.title: üìú Amoheloa ho SafetyHelp
step_0.description: Hlahloba lisebelisoa le lisebelisoa tsa rona tse felletseng ho ntlafatsa polokeho le bophelo bo botle sebakeng sa hau sa mosebetsi.
step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Na u ne u tseba hore ho sebelisa bafani ba nang le boit≈°oaro bo botle ho ka fokotsa kotsi ea likotsi tsa mosebetsi ka ho netefatsa hore mosebetsi o etsoa ka nako le ka maemo a phahameng a polokeho?

intro.title: Amoheloa ho SafetyHelp
intro.description: Hlahloba lisebelisoa le lisebelisoa tsa rona tse felletseng ho ntlafatsa polokeho le bophelo bo botle sebakeng sa hau sa mosebetsi.

welcome.title: Amoheloa ho SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Sethala sa hau se t≈°epahalang sa bophelo bo botle le polokeho ea mosebetsi (OHS) Afrika Borwa. Re fana ka lisebelisoa tse ikemetseng, tse ntlafalitsoeng ka AI ho netefatsa polokeho le ho latela melao bakeng sa likolo, likereke le likarolo tse sa reroang. Kopanela le sechaba sa rona bakeng sa phihlello ea lisebelisoa, lit≈°ebeletso le t≈°ehetso e ikhethileng ho litlhoko tsa hau.

why_choose.title: Hobaneng u Khetha SafetyHelp bakeng sa Ho Latela OHS?
why_choose.content: SafetyHelp ke molekane oa hau ea t≈°epahalang bakeng sa ho latela bophelo bo botle le polokeho ea mosebetsi Afrika Borwa. Sethala sa rona se fana ka sehlopha se felletseng sa lisebelisoa tse hlophiselitsoeng ho fihlela litlhoko tse ikhethang tsa liindasteri tse kang kaho, merafo le tlhahiso. Ho tloha ho hlahiseng lirekoto tsa molao ho isa tlhahlobong ea kotsi, SafetyHelp e nolofatsa litlhoko tse rarahaneng tsa OHS ka li-wizard tse bonolo ho sebelisa le t≈°ehetso ea nako ea sebele ka chatbot ea rona e bululetsoeng ke AI. E t≈°ehelitsoe ke melao ea Afrika Borwa le mekhoa e metle, re matlafatsa likhoebo ho theha libaka tsa mosebetsi tse sireletsehileng ha re ntse re netefatsa ho latela OHSA le COIDA. Kopanela le batho ba likete ba litsebi ba it≈°etlehileng ka SafetyHelp ho sireletsa lihlopha tsa bona le ho nolofatsa lits'ebetso tsa polokeho.

client.title: Litlamo tsa Moreki
client.reg_5_1_a: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(a): Lokisetsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi ea Motheo (BRA) e supang likotsi tsa projeke.
client.reg_5_1_b: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(b): Fana ka Tlhophiso ea Bophelo le Polokeho e hlalosang litlhoko tse ikhethang tsa projeke.
client.reg_5_1_l: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(l): Amohela Moralo oa Bophelo le Polokeho oa Mokonteraka pele mosebetsi o qala.

contractor.title: Litlamo tsa Mokonteraka
contractor.reg_7_1_a: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(a): Fana ka Moralo oa Bophelo le Polokeho o thehiloeng ho tlhophiso ea moreki.
contractor.reg_7_1_b: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(b): Boloka Faele ea Bophelo le Polokeho sebakeng sa kaho e nang le litokomane tsohle tse hlokahalang.
contractor.reg_9: Molao oa Kaho 9: Etsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi e ikhethileng ea mosebetsi le Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi e Hlophisitsoeng ea Likotsi (HIRAs).

professional.title: Litlamo tsa Litsebi tsa Bophelo le Polokeho
professional.reg_5_5: Molao oa Kaho 5(5): Baemeli (PrCHSA) ba laola bophelo le polokeho molemong oa moreki, ba netefatsa ho latela melao.
professional.reg_8_5: Molao oa Kaho 8(5): Liofisiri (CHSO) li thusa bakonteraka ka ho kenya t≈°ebetsong le ho beha leihlo litsamaiso tsa OHS.
professional.sacpcmp: Melao ea SACPCMP: Ho tlameha ho boloka ngoliso le litlhoko tsa CPD bakeng sa boemo ba litsebi.

page_title.construction: SafetyHelp - Bophelo le Polokeho ea Kaho

construction.title: Bophelo le Polokeho ea Kaho
construction.description: Netefatsa ho latela melao ea bophelo le polokeho ea kaho ka Lisebelisoa tsa OHS tsa SafetyHelp. Lisebelisoa tsa rona li u thusa ho laola likotsi, ho finyella litlhoko tsa molao, le ho sireletsa basebetsi sebakeng sa kaho, ka t≈°ebeliso ea mekhoa e metle joalo ka ha e hlalositsoe ho 'Polokeho Pele: Lintho tsa Bohlokoa tsa Merero ea OHS.'
construction.download_link: Khoasolla Moralo oa OHS oa Kaho:

legal_appointments.title: Likhetho tsa Molao
legal_appointments.description: Laola likhetho tsa molao bakeng sa bophelo bo botle le polokeho ea mosebetsi joalo ka ha ho hlokoa ke melao ea OHS ea Afrika Borwa. Sebelisa organogram ho abela likarolo, tlatsa lintlha tsa mohiri, le ho hlahisa tokomaneng e felletseng e nang le mangolo a likhetho, lirekoto tsa koetliso, le tse ling.

organogram.title: Organogram bakeng sa Likhetho tsa Molao tsa OHS

form.name: Lebitso la Motho ea Khethiloeng
form.name_error: Ka kopo kenya lebitso la motho ea khethiloeng.
form.email_error: Ka kopo kenya aterese ea e-poso e nepahetseng.
form.phone_error: Ka kopo kenya nomoro ea mohala e nepahetseng (mohl., +27123456789).
form.start_date_error: Ka kopo kenya letsatsi la qalo.
form.training_error: Ka kopo kenya lintlha tsa koetliso/bokhoni.

legislation.title: Melao
legislation.description: Finyelela laeboraring e felletseng ea melao ea OHS, maemo, le lintlafatso. Hlahisa lirekoto tsa molao tsa OHS, batla melao e itseng, le ho hlahloba kamano pakeng tsa melaoana. Litlhaloso tse nolofalitsoeng li fumaneha bakeng sa ho reka ho etsa hore litokomane tsa molao tse rarahaneng li fumanehe habonolo.

updates.title: Lintlafatso tsa Melao le Merero ea Melaoana

services.title: Lit≈°ebeletso tsa SafetyHelp
services.description: Fumana mefuta e mengata ea lit≈°ebeletso tsa bophelo bo botle le polokeho ea mosebetsi tse etselitsoeng ho t≈°ehetsa libaka tsa mosebetsi, likolo, likereke, le likarolo tse sa reroang ho pholletsa le Afrika Borwa. Ho tloha ho boeletsi ho isa koetlisong, SafetyHelp e fana ka litharollo tse ikhethileng ho netefatsa ho latela le polokeho.

consulting.title: Boeletsi ba OHS
consulting.description: Fumana likeletso tsa litsebi mabapi le ho latela OHS, tsamaiso ea likotsi, le likhetho tsa molao ho tsoa ho litsebi tsa rona tse netefalitsoeng. Re sebelitse le mekhatlo e kang Anglo Platinum, ABSA, le Metrorail ho fana ka litharollo tse ikhethileng.

training.title: Mananeo a Koetliso
training.description: Finyelela mananeo a koetliso a felletseng bakeng sa liindasteri tsohle, ho kenyeletsoa kaho, tlhahiso, le thuto. Khetha ho tsoa koetlisong ea ho qala, lithupelo tse ikhethileng tsa karolo, le tse ling, tsohle li tsamaisana le melao ea OHS ea Afrika Borwa.

audits.title: Litlhahlobo le Hlahlobo
audits.description: Netefatsa hore sebaka sa hau sa mosebetsi se latela maemo a OHS ka lit≈°ebeletso tsa rona tsa tlhahlobo le hlahlobo. Lisebelisoa tsa rona li u thusa ho etsa litlhahlobo tse phethahetseng, ho hlahisa litlaleho, le ho kenya ts'ebetsong litokiso.

risk_management.title: Merero ea Tsamaiso ea Likotsi
risk_management.description: Hlahisa merero ea tsamaiso ea likotsi e ikhethileng (RMPs) e akaretsang melao ea Afrika Borwa, melaoana ea bomasepala, le maemo a lefat≈°e ka bophara a kang ISO 45001, ho netefatsa hore khoebo ea hau e itokiselitse kotsi efe kapa efe.

support.title: T≈°ehetso le Lisebelisoa tsa Sechaba
support.description: Kopanela le sechaba sa rona ho tlaleha liketsahalo, ho fumana manane a polokeho bakeng sa mabenkele a manyane, likolo, le litaverna, le ho hokahana le litsebi tse ling tsa OHS bakeng sa t≈°ehetso le t≈°ebelisano.

training.title: Koetliso e Felletseng ea Sebaka sa Mosebetsi
training.description: Hlahloba mananeo a rona a koetliso a felletseng a sebaka sa mosebetsi ho netefatsa ho latela melao ea OHS ea Afrika Borwa le ho khothaletsa sebaka sa mosebetsi se sireletsehileng. Khetha ho tsoa koetlisong ea boitlhakiso, koetliso ea sehlopha, kapa sebelisa wizard ea rona bakeng sa likhothaletso tse ikhethileng tse thehiloeng indastering ea hau, bamameli ba hau, le sebaka.

action_buttons.view_manual: Reka Bukana ea Koetliso e Fetolehang

checkout.disclaimer: Boitlhotlhollo ba SafetyHelp: Lisebelisoa tsa koetliso tse fanoeng ke tsa tlhahisoleseding feela ‚Äôme ha li fane ka likeletso tsa litsebi. Bakeng sa litharollo tsa OHS tse ikhethileng, ka kopo iteanye le SafetyHelp ho support@safetyhelp.co.za kapa etela Leqephe la Iteanyo.

cart.success: Tefo e atlehile! Lisebelisoa tsa hau tsa koetliso li hlahisitsoe. Khoasolla li-PDF tsa hau ka tlase. Bakeng sa koetliso ea inthaneteng, likhoutu tsa phihlello li rometsoe ho uena ka e-poso.

legal_fact.step_1: Taba ea Molao: Karolo 8 ea Molao oa OHS e hloka hore bahiri ba fane ka koetliso e lokiselitsoeng likotsi tse khethehileng tsa sebaka sa mosebetsi.
legal_fact.step_3: Taba ea Molao: Bomasepala ba lehae ba ka ba le melao e fapaneng ea OHS e amang litlhoko tsa koetliso.

fun_fact.step_2: Taba e Thabisang: Na u ne u tseba hore koetliso e tloaelehileng e ka fokotsa liketsahalo tsa sebaka sa mosebetsi ho fihlela 30%?
fun_fact.step_4: Taba e Thabisang: Libaka tsa mosebetsi tse nang le kotsi e phahameng joalo ka libaka tsa kaho li hloka koetliso e tloaelehileng ho boloka maemo a polokeho.
